name: Tutorial 1
message: Swipe to move the green block out of the way to clear a path for the laser!

name: Tutorial 2
message: Dark blocks are rooted in place. Move the green block around them!

name: Tutorial 4
message: Use dark blocks to stop green ones from moving!

name: Basic 2
message: Many puzzles have multiple ways to solve them!

name: Basic 3
message: Try to solve each puzzle with the fewest moves possible!

name: Basic 4
message: Some levels require a specific strategy!

name: Basic 5
message: This one is doable in 6 moves!

name: Mirrors 3
message: Splitters turn one laser into two!

name: Pistons 1
message: Piston blocks move other blocks on their own!

name: Confusion 1
message: Confused blocks move after everything else has moved and they move in the wrong direction!
